project_plan.name: Simple Contact Book in Python
project_plan.description: Implement a simple contact book that allows users to add, search, update, and delete contacts, storing the contacts in a JSON file. The program will interact with users through the terminal.

task.name: Implement the function to add a contact
Implement the function to search for a contact
Implement the function to update a contact
Implement the function to delete a contact
Implement JSON file handling to store contacts
Create a user interface to interact through the terminal
Write tests for each of the functions above
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
